faqs.question: Do variants stay sticky per visitor?
faqs.answer: Yes. The VariantProvider respects URL overrides, then localStorage so visitors keep the same experience.

faqs.question: What if the API is down?
faqs.answer: The fallback variant in .vrooli/variants/fallback.json renders instantly with baked sections + pricing.

faqs.question: Can I gate downloads per plan?
faqs.answer: Download buttons stay disabled until entitlements confirm an active subscription.
